(telefontartó)
(szerszám beállítás)
t1 m d1.5 h19
yxz


t1
s50
f200

z1 = 3

b outline 0,0 size81.5,124.5 g2,1,0.7 z$z1 c0.1 nl1,1,1,0

r1 = 15.5
d2 = -0.75

a $d2,$r1 $r1,$d2 $r1,$r1 z$z1 c0.1

px = 82.25
ox = sub($px,$r1)
ox1 = sub($ox,0.75)

a $ox,$d2 $px,$r1 $ox1,$r1 z$z1 c0.1

by = add($r1,$d2)
bx = sub($px,3)

b inline $px,$by $bx,79.25 g1,1,0.7 z$z1 c0.1 nl1,1,0,1

b inline -0.75,$by 2.25,39.25 g1,1,0.7 z$z1 c0.1 nl0,1,1,1

b inline $r1,$d2 $ox,2.25 g1,1,0.7 z$z1 c0.1 nl1,1,1,0

#a -0.75,80 39.25,120 -0.75,120 z$z1 c0.1

a 4.25,80 24.25,100 4.25,100 z$z1 c0.1

l 24.25,100 24.25,125 g1,1,0.7 z$z1 c0.1
l 4.25,80 0,80 g1,1,0.7 z$z1 c0.1


(tavtarto)
offset0,-20
a $d2,$r1 $r1,$d2 $r1,$r1 z$z1 c0.1
offset4.5,-15.5
a $r1,$d2 $d2,$r1 $d2,$d2 z$z1 c0.1

offset0,-20
a $ox,$d2 $px,$r1 $ox1,$r1 z$z1 c0.1
offset-4.5,-15.5
a $px,$r1 $ox,$d2 $px,0 z$z1 c0.1

offset0,-40
a $d2,$r1 $r1,$d2 $r1,$r1 z$z1 c0.1
#l $d2,$r1 10,$r1
#l $r1,$d2 $r1,10

offset4.5,-35.5
a $d2,$r1 $r1,$d2 $r1,$r1 z$z1 c0.1

offset0,-40
a $ox,$d2 $px,$r1 $ox1,$r1 z$z1 c0.1
#l $ox,$d2 $ox,10
#l $px,$r1 70,$r1

offset-4.5,-35.5
a $ox,$d2 $px,$r1 $ox1,$r1 z$z1 c0.1

offset1,-41

b outline 20,0 size40,3 g1,1,0.7 z$z1 c0.1
h
